entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
